cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's migigawa

sentence.kanji: 彼女はいつも私の右側を歩きます。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha itsumo watashi no migigawa wo arukimasu
sentence.english: She always walks on my right.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukeru

sentence.kanji: おまけを付けました。
sentence.romaji: omake wo tsukemashita
sentence.english: I added a freebie.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uketsukeru

sentence.kanji: 郵便物は5時まで受け付けています。
sentence.romaji: yuubinbutsu ha goji made uketsukete imasu
sentence.english: We accept mail until five o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uketsuke

sentence.kanji: 受付は9時からです。
sentence.romaji: uketsuke ha kuji kara desu
sentence.english: Registration is from nine o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gutaiteki

sentence.kanji: 具体的な例をいくつか見せてください。
sentence.romaji: gutaiteki na rei wo ikutsuka misete kudasai
sentence.english: Please show me some concrete examples.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tatoeba

sentence.kanji: 例えば、このソフトで日本語を勉強することができます。
sentence.romaji: tatoeba kono sofuto de nihongo wo benkyou suru koto ga dekimasu
sentence.english: You can use this software to study Japanese, for example.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rei

sentence.kanji: 一つ例をあげてください。
sentence.romaji: hitotsu rei wo agete kudasai
sentence.english: Please give an example.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanai

sentence.kanji: 家内は九州出身です。
sentence.romaji: kanai ha kyuushuu shushin desu
sentence.english: My wife is from Kyushu.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futari

sentence.kanji: 今日は妻と二人で食事をします。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha tsuma to futari de shokuji wo shimasu
sentence.english: Today I'm having dinner with my wife, just the two of us.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's niku

sentence.kanji: 肉が焼けました。
sentence.romaji: niku ga yakemashita
sentence.english: The meat is cooked.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hana

sentence.kanji: きれいな花が咲きました。
sentence.romaji: kirei na hana ga sakimashita
sentence.english: Beautiful flowers have bloomed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naiyou

sentence.kanji: この本の内容を説明してください。
sentence.romaji: kono hon no naiyou wo setsumei shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please explain the content of this book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kana

sentence.kanji: お名前に仮名を振ってください。
sentence.romaji: onamae ni kana wo fute kudasai
sentence.english: Please write the pronunciation of your name in kana.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bijin

sentence.kanji: 彼のお母さんは美人です。
sentence.romaji: kare no okaasan ha bijin desu
sentence.english: His mother's a beautiful woman.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kawaru

sentence.kanji: 上司に代わって会議に出た。
sentence.romaji: joushi ni kawate kaigi ni deta
sentence.english: I attended the conference in place of my boss.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsutaeru

sentence.kanji: みんなにこのことを伝えてください。
sentence.romaji: minna ni kono koto wo tsutaete kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell everyone about this matter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teisha

sentence.kanji: この電車は東京まで停車致しません。
sentence.romaji: kono densha ha toukyou made teisha itashimasen
sentence.english: This train won't stop until Tokyo.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taoreru

sentence.kanji: 強風で木が倒れた。
sentence.romaji: kyoufuu de ki ga taoreta
sentence.english: The tree fell in the gale.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taosu

sentence.kanji: そのスキーヤーはポールを倒した。
sentence.romaji: sono suki-ya- ha po-ru wo taoshita
sentence.english: The skier knocked the pole down.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keikou

sentence.kanji: 最近の若者は難しい本を読まない傾向がある。
sentence.romaji: saikin no wakamono ha muzukashii hon wo yomanai keikou ga aru
sentence.english: Young people these days tend not to read difficult books.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuukei

sentence.kanji: 少し休憩しましょう。
sentence.romaji: sukoshi kyuukei shimashou
sentence.english: Let's take a break.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keshou

sentence.kanji: 彼女は化粧が上手い。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha keshou ga umai
sentence.english: She's very good with makeup.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's butaniku

sentence.kanji: 豚肉は美味しいです。
sentence.romaji: butaniku ha oishii desu
sentence.english: Pork is delicious.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tebukuro

sentence.kanji: 寒いので手袋をしました。
sentence.romaji: samui no de tebukuro wo shimashita
sentence.english: I wore gloves because it was cold.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukuro

sentence.kanji: 袋はいりません。
sentence.romaji: fukuro ha irimasen
sentence.english: I don't need a bag.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kusaru

sentence.kanji: リンゴが腐っている。
sentence.romaji: ringo ga kusate iru
sentence.english: This apple's rotten.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuyuyasumi

sentence.kanji: 冬休みにお祖父ちゃんの家に行きます。
sentence.romaji: fuyuyasumi ni ojiichan no uchi ni ikimasu
sentence.english: I'm going to grandpa's house during winter break.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kasa

sentence.kanji: 電車に傘を忘れた。
sentence.romaji: densha ni kasa wo wasureta
sentence.english: I left my umbrella on the train.

cards.english: attach itself to, be connected with, come in contact with
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuku

sentence.kanji: 靴に泥が付いています。
sentence.romaji: kutsu ni doro ga tsuite imasu
sentence.english: I have mud on my shoes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's homeru

sentence.kanji: 頑張ったので褒められました。
sentence.romaji: ganbata no de homeraremashita
sentence.english: He was praised because worked hard.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otona

sentence.kanji: あなたもだいぶ大人になったね。
sentence.romaji: anata mo daibu otona ni nata ne
sentence.english: You've grown up quite a bit.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nante

sentence.kanji: 何てきれいな人なんだ。
sentence.romaji: nante kirei na hito nanda
sentence.english: What a beautiful person she is!

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitoyasumi

sentence.kanji: ここで一休みしましょう。
sentence.romaji: koko de hitoyasumi shimashou
sentence.english: Let's take a break here.

cards.english: the person himself, the said person
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honnin

sentence.kanji: それは本人に聞いてください。
sentence.romaji: sore ha honnin ni kiite kudasai
sentence.english: Please ask the person in question.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanabi

sentence.kanji: 昨日、花火を見に行ったよ。
sentence.romaji: kinou hanabi wo mi ni ita yo
sentence.english: I went to see fireworks yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuukyuu

sentence.kanji: うちの会社は週休2日です。
sentence.romaji: uchi no kaisha ha shuukyuu futsuka desu
sentence.english: Our company has two days off a week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itai

sentence.kanji: 一体何事ですか。
sentence.romaji: itai nanigoto desu ka
sentence.english: What on earth is going on?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naniyori

sentence.kanji: ご無事で何よりです。
sentence.romaji: gobuji de naniyori desu
sentence.english: I'm glad to know you're safe.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's neagari

sentence.kanji: 野菜が値上がりしていますね。
sentence.romaji: yasai ga neagari shite imasu ne
sentence.english: The price of vegetables is going up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nesagari

sentence.kanji: ガソリンが値下がりしました。
sentence.romaji: gasorin ga nesagari shimashita
sentence.english: The price of gasoline has gone down.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nesage

sentence.kanji: 電話料金が値下げされた。
sentence.romaji: denwa ryoukin ga nesage sareta
sentence.english: My phone charge was reduced.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uchi

sentence.kanji: 心の内をお話し下さい。
sentence.romaji: kokoro no uchi wo o hanashi kudasai
sentence.english: Please speak your mind.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukaimichi

sentence.kanji: ボーナスの使い道を考えているところです。
sentence.romaji: bo-nasu no tsukaimichi wo kangaete iru tokoro desu
sentence.english: I'm just thinking about how to use my bonus.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouben

sentence.kanji: ちょっと小便しに行って来る。
sentence.romaji: choto shouben shi ni ite kuru
sentence.english: Sorry, I am going for a pee.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jinmei

sentence.kanji: これは日本の人名ですか。
sentence.romaji: kore ha nihon no jinmei desu ka
sentence.english: Is this a Japanese name?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sumai

sentence.kanji: 私の住まいは東京にあります。
sentence.romaji: watashi no sumai ha toukyou ni arimasu
sentence.english: My residence is in Tokyo.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shanai

sentence.kanji: 車内に忘れ物があったよ。
sentence.romaji: shanai ni wasuremono ga ata yo
sentence.english: There was something left behind in the car.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuugaku

sentence.kanji: 1年休学することにしました。
sentence.romaji: ichinen kyuugaku suru koto ni shimashita
sentence.english: I decided to take a one-year leave from school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tanin

sentence.kanji: 私は他人に住所を教えたくない。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha tanin ni juusho wo oshietaku nai
sentence.english: I don't want to tell other people my address.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nanika

sentence.kanji: 何か質問はありますか。
sentence.romaji: nanika shitsumon ha arimasu ka
sentence.english: Are there any questions?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shounin

sentence.kanji: 商人は数字に強いね。
sentence.romaji: shounin ha suuji ni tsuyoi ne
sentence.english: Businessmen are good with figures.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koko

sentence.kanji: 個々の問題を解決しましょう。
sentence.romaji: koko no mondai wo kaiketsu shimashou
sentence.english: Let's solve the problems one by one.
